attributes.action: Ban LCP: Local Connection Preference and LLP Local Lettings Policy on the housing waiting lists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LLP's and LCP's on the housing list or any other policies that give housing preference to people based on their blood connection to an area, should be banned outright! On the grounds that it's racist to applicants from near and far and it also clashes with the freedom of movement laws in the UK.
